description.value:
You have the knowledge needed to understand ancient texts and cultural artifacts.

You can use Society when @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Decipher Writing]{Deciphering Writing}, no matter the type of writing you are examining.

You can also use Society to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Identify Magic]{Identify Magic} when examining a magic item or location with cultural significance.
